item.description:
Hot Salsa, Bachata and Merengue at Club Caribe (4th Thursdays Every Month!)

I have been hosting Salsa and Sushi for several months now and we have always had a blast. I know that schedules as well as other commitments can make it hard to join us for dinner downstairs at Bisuteki so why not join us after later for some exciting Latin Dancing.

For more Information on Caribe please check out the URL below. You may also want to bring a friend and take advantage of the 2 for $20 deal. 

Salsaboston.com/caribe/

P.S. There's often free appetizers including eggrolls outside the ballroom & Trader Joe's is just a short walk away and the bar is always open for refreshments.
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be finishing up dinner and heading upstairs at 9pm so lets meet by the bar and dance floor upstairs
item.name: Salsa after Sushi by the Charles River
